name: Gd rpg (Beta)
description:
(This is my first time publishing something)

A rpg I made and am still making based off of Gd art bc that's the hardest part (along with music, which is skipped). It is made with RPG paper maker as it's easy to use, and uses assets/audio that it comes with. 

This game is super unfinished and no in game plot whatsoever and I plan for more updates.
